vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of protective gas masks and related parts for the Dallas Police Department with Con10gency Consulting, LLC through the Local Government Purchasing Cooperative (BuyBoard) agreement - Estimated amount not to exceed  $520,725.15 - Financing: 2023 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative Fund ($97,961.88) and General Fund ($422,763.27) (subject to annual appropriations)
